DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter study evaluate lung function symptom subject COPD regular use one long-acting bronchodilator .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Lung Function Symptoms Patients Diagnosed With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Long-Acting Bronchodilator Monotherapy
DOC.criteria: Cigarette smoke historyCurrent exsmokers ( define stop smoke least three month prior study visit ) Established history COPD diagnose physician Regular use ( prescribe use every day ) one longacting bronchodilator great equal one month study visit Ability read , comprehend , record information English language Currently active asthma ( receive asthma therapy asthma symptom ) Use ipratropium/albuterol combination product great three time per day , use inhaled corticosteroid , use inhale corticosteroid/longacting betaagonist combination , theophylline preparation , oral beta agonist within 3 month prior study visit Previous lung surgery Other respiratory disorder COPD Current alcohol , illegal drug , solvent abuse Females positive urine pregnancy test study visit
